ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanters and the Charisma vs Int Battle
ygData.msgSnippet: well, and this is from a druids point of view mind you, that cha only affects if the spell will stick and (according Verant) from then on the charm has to go
ygData.messageBody:
well, and this is from a druids point of view mind you, that cha only
affects if the spell will stick and (according Verant) from then on the
charm has to go through a saving roll every so often and that the spell
caster's stats have nothing to do with the saving roll(duration) on the
charm. Of course you have to take anything Verant says with a grain of
salt, so you may want to keep your cha high, but in my exp with my low cha
halfling(50 cha) if the charm sticks it can last as long as someone with a
real high cha.

Suttun Fuzziefoot
Lvl 42 druid of Rocent Nife, obsessed with the crack that is clarity
